announcement_text: Bihar Government launches new welfare scheme for youth. Aptitude test results for April batch released. Important update: Yuva Saathi portal maintenance on 15th June.
hero_heading: Discover Your Path to Success with Yuva Saathi
hero_subheading: Connecting you to skill development, jobs, and a brighter future in Bihar.

carousel_images.description: Beneficiaries of a Bihar government scheme

description: Explore real-time data on skill development progress, participant demographics, and regional impact for the state of Bihar.
importanceDescription: These analytics provide critical insights into the effectiveness of local-level skill development programs. By tracking progress at the district and mandal level, government bodies can make data-driven decisions to optimize resource allocation, identify underdeveloped areas, and tailor initiatives to meet specific regional needs. This ensures a more equitable and impactful development process for all citizens.
Supporting for enhancing skills and crea: Supporting for enhancing skills and creating a skilled workforce
The Bihar government is bridging the ski: The Bihar government is bridging the skills gap with targeted training programs
Highlighting the impact of skill develop: Highlighting the impact of skill development on employment and economic growth
Transforming lives with practical, job-o: Transforming lives with practical, job-oriented skill development initiatives
